turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, can you order me a coffee to pick up at Peets?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: absolutely, which location are you nearest

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Elm street in Winnetka

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I have it, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: and iced cafe mocha

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure what size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Medium please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what kind of milk would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: what are my choices

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: non fat, 2%, whole milk, soy milk, or almond milk

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: almond milk please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok so I have a medium cafe mocha with almond milk, anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: no, can you tell me how many calories are in that?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 195 calories

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: ok great

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want me to put that order in for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: yes absolutely

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok great, your order is in, your receipt will be Texted to you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: awesome thank you!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're very welcome have a great day
